document.full_text: afghan president hamid karzai called on the taliban on monday to cease fighting after the killing of al qaeda leader osama bin laden and added they should learn a lesson from his death.
document.title: afghan leader tells taliban not to fight after bin laden death
lines_and_colors: afghan president hamid karzai called on the taliban on monday to cease fighting after the killing of al qaeda leader osama bin laden and added they should learn a lesson from his death.
